Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/84th
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/23rd
ShortDescription: Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Blue Island, Western, Cermak and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/23rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Blue Island, Western, Cermak and Damen, then resume their normal route: due to, street blockage near Damen/23rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #X9 Ashland Express & #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/85th
ShortDescription: Southbound #X9 Ashland Express & #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Damen, 87th and Damen, due to street blockage near Ashland/85th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #X9 Ashland Express & #9 Ashland  buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Damen, 87th and Damen, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Ashland/85th.

Northbound uses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange, 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange, 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange, 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
